short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adjusting YouTube Playback Speed Using Spacebar and Control Key

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pressing and holding the spacebar on YouTube makes it play at double speed. This is a basic function of YouTube. If you double tap the control key at this time, the double speed will continue. If you want to cancel the double speed, press and hold the spacebar to enter double speed and then release the spacebar.
